features.title: Yakhiwe Mzansi
features.subtitle: Purple Glow ayihundzululwanga nje kuphela—iyati ngemasiko. Kusukela elilwimini letfutfukile kuya ku-Afrikaans webubhizinisi.

aiEngine.title: Injini Yeludzaba lwe-AI
aiEngine.description: Gemini 2.5 Flash + Imagen 3 iniketa emandla emaphosti akho. Khicita umbhalo, tifaniso netividiyo letihambisana nebalaleli baseNingizimu Afrika.

multilingual.title: Tilulwimi te-11, Inkundla yinye
multilingual.description: Posta nge-siSwati ekuseni, nge-Afrikaans emini, nge-Singisi ntambama. Shintsha tilulwimi emkhatsini wesigaba.

scheduling.title: Kuhleleka Lokuhlakaniph
scheduling.description: I-AI ifundza tikhathi letinhle kakhulu tekuposta kubalaleli bakho. Hlela ludzaba lwenyanga yonkhe ngemaminitsi la-10.

step1.title: Chaza i-Vibe Yakho
step1.description: Tshela i-Purple Glow kutsi utsengisani noma ukhuthazani. Khetsa ithoni yakho: Mzansi Cool, Corporate, noma Cyberpunk.

step2.title: I-AI Ikhicita Ludzaba
step2.description: Injini yetfu leniketwe emandla yi-Gemini ikhicita emaphosti lahlelwe ngendlela yenkundla ngetifaniso emsekhondwini.

step3.title: Hlela & Posta
step3.description: Buyeketa, lungiselela noma hlela. I-Purple Glow iphata lekunye—futsi ifana naphakamisa tikhathi letinhle kakhulu tekuposta.

thabo.quote: I-Purple Glow ingisitako ngakhula kusukela ku-500 kuya ku-5,000 balandzeli etinyangeni te-3. Ludzaba lwe-siSwati lushaya ngenye indlela.
thabo.name: Thabo M.

zanele.quote: Manje ngiyakwati kuposta ngetilulwimi tonkhe te-11 ngaphandle kwekukhipha umhumusho. Kushintse umdlalo emabhizinisini etilokishi.
zanele.name: Zanele K.

pieter.quote: I-AI iyati ngetaga te-Afrikaans kangcono kunelitsemba lami lekwentsisa. Ons is baie impressed.
